name: 350 degree oven
ingredients: Can of minced clams (drained, but reserve a little clam juice)
Cream or milk to desired consistency
instructions: With mixer, cream the cheese until smooth
Add sour cream, garlic salt, Worchester sauce, clam juice, and lemon juice, mix to desired consistency (add milk or cream if needed)

As you can see this is one of those recipes that really isn’t a recipe. Experiment …..You can’t make this bad! From the kitchen of first mate Kimberly Marrinan with an “assist” from her mother, Grace Alice Regan (who she stole the recipe from) and a further “assist” from her mother, Anne Wolff Regan (who she stole the recipe from).
